LanguageData.Gun_GWBWastelandSniper.label: Wasteland Sniper
LanguageData.Gun_GWBWastelandSniper.description: The Sniper is an assault rifle with a full stock and a scope. The rifle loosely resembles a SIG SG 551/553.
